title: February 2022 patches rolling out to the OnePlus 7 series, OnePlus 8T and OnePlus Nord N100
content:
OnePlus has started rolling out February 2021 security patches to a bunch of smartphones. The OnePlus Nord 2 was the first to get the latest security patch, and the company is now giving the same treatment to the OnePlus 7 series, OnePlus 8T, and OnePlus Nord N100. OnePlus is rolling out OxygenOS 11.0.6.1 to the

The post February 2022 patches rolling out to the OnePlus 7 series, OnePlus 8T and OnePlus Nord N100 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: OnePlus is rolling out February 2022 security update to the OnePlus 7, OnePlus 7 Pro, OnePlus 7T, OnePlus 7T Pro, OnePlus 8T and Nord N100.
